question: Posted by Jodi B on April 16, 1999 at 07:12:37I have recently had blood tests done, and my serum Vitamin B12 was 3180 (normal 80-600).  I then found out that last year it was already elevated at >1000.  I'm having much difficulty finding out information about elevated B12.  I've had Ulcerative colitis for 18 years, and insulin dependant diabetes for 20 years.  Any idea what could be the cause of these results?Posted by HFHSM.D.-D.M. on April 23, 1999 at 17:29:57Dear Jodi B:Your lab tests are certainly interesting.  I don
title: high Vitamin B12
